description:
While drinking a can of coffee, Shion complains it tastes strange. A worried Kyoya tries tasting it, but...
One sunny afternoon, the president takes a nap. What is the reason for the unbelievable words she says in her sleep?
Their unique personalities become increasingly apparent??
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 友情, 愛情, 少女的異常
友情・愛情・彼女の異常?
